Classify pediatric tumors according to the ICCC3 standards.

classify_childhood.Rd

Classify pediatric tumors according to the ICCC3 standards.

Usage

classify_childhood(topo, morp, beha, type = "sub", version = "v2005")

Arguments

topo

Topography codes of ICDO3, it could be in the format of 'C15.6' or C156'.

morp

Morphology codes of ICDO3, it could be in the format of '8000' or 'M8140'.

beha

Behaviour code of ICDO3.

type

Type of Classification for the output, options are 'main' or 'sub', default is 'main'.

version

The ICCC3 standards, "v2005" or "v2017".

Value

Recode of ICCC3 classification.

Details

This function classify the 'topo' and 'morp' parts of ICDO3 codes into ICCC3 (International Classification of Childhood Cancer, Third edition).
